'''''Vinyar Tengwar 41''''' is the forty-first issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|40|42}}

==Contents==
* Letters to ''VT''

* "Etymological Notes on the ''[[Ósanwe-kenta]]''"✫ — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Carl F. Hostetter
* "From ''[[The Shibboleth of Fëanor]]''"✫ — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Carl F. Hostetter
* "Notes on ''[[Óre]]''"✫ — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Carl F. Hostetter
* "The Fëanorian ''Tengwar'' and the Typology of Phonetic Writing Systems" — Ivan A. Derzhanski
* "Transitions in Translations: Proudfoots vs. Proudfeet" (column) — Arden R. Smith

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
